thread.title: BRIEF-NAOS Absolute Opportunities Posts ‍HY Revenue Of $8.2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NAOS Absolute Opportunities Posts ‍HY Revenue Of $8.2 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - naos absolute opportunities co ltd

text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - NAOS Absolute Opportunities Co Ltd :
* ‍HY REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES $8.2 MILLION, UP 136.8%​
* HY PROFIT FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS $4.6MLN, UP 121.3 PERCENT
* ‍DECLARED 2018 INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 2.75​ PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
